CoreHome.CategoryNoData: No data in this category. Try to "Include all population".
CoreHome.ClickToSeeFullInformation: Click to see the full information
CoreHome.CloseWidgetDirections: You can close this widget by clicking on the 'X' icon at the top of the widget.
CoreHome.DataForThisReportHasBeenPurged: The data for this report is more than %s months old and has been purged.
CoreHome.DataTableExcludeAggregateRows: Aggregate rows are shown %s Hide them
CoreHome.DataTableIncludeAggregateRows: Aggregate rows are hidden %s Show them
CoreHome.DataTableHowToSearch: Press enter or click the search icon to search
CoreHome.DataTableShowDimensions: Dimensions are shown combined %s Show dimensions separately
CoreHome.DataTableCombineDimensions: Dimensions are shown separately %s Show dimensions combined
CoreHome.DonateCall1: Matomo will always cost you nothing to use, but that doesn't mean it costs us nothing to make.
CoreHome.DonateCall2: Matomo needs your continued support to grow and thrive.
CoreHome.DonateCall3: If you feel that Matomo has added significant value to your business or endeavour, %1$splease consider donating%2$s or %3$spurchasing a premium feature%4$s. Every penny will help.
CoreHome.DonateFormInstructions: Click on the slider to select an amount, then click subscribe to donate.
CoreHome.ExceptionNotWhitelistedIP: You cannot use this Matomo as your IP %s is not whitelisted
CoreHome.ExcludeRowsWithLowPopulation: All rows are shown %s Exclude low population
CoreHome.FlattenDataTable: The report is hierarchical %s Make it flat
CoreHome.HowMuchIsPiwikWorth: How much is Matomo worth to you?
CoreHome.IncludeRowsWithLowPopulation: Rows with low population are hidden %s Show all rows
CoreHome.InjectedHostEmailBody: Hello, I tried to access Matomo today and encountered the unknown hostname warning.
CoreHome.InjectedHostEmailSubject: Matomo was accessed with an unknown hostname: %s
CoreHome.InjectedHostNonSuperUserWarning: %1$sClick here to access Matomo safely%2$s and remove this warning. You may also want to contact your Matomo administrator and notify them about this issue (%3$sclick here to email%4$s).
CoreHome.InjectedHostSuperUserWarning: Matomo may be misconfigured (for example, if Matomo was recently moved to a new server or URL). You can either %1$sclick here and add %2$s as the valid Matomo hostname (if you trust it)%3$s, or %4$sclick here and go to %5$s to access Matomo safely%6$s.
CoreHome.InjectedHostWarningIntro: You are now accessing Matomo from %1$s, but Matomo has been configured to run at this address: %2$s.
CoreHome.JavascriptDisabled:
JavaScript must be enabled in order for you to use Matomo in standard view.
However, it seems JavaScript is either disabled or not supported by your browser.
To use standard view, enable JavaScript by changing your browser options, then %1$stry again%2$s.
CoreHome.MakeOneTimeDonation: Make a one time donation, instead.
CoreHome.NoPrivilegesAskPiwikAdmin: You are logged in as '%1$s' but it seems you don't have any permission set in Matomo. %2$s Ask your Matomo administrator (click to email)%3$s to give you 'view' access to a website.
CoreHome.OnlyForSuperUserAccess: This widget is displayed in the default dashboard only to users having Super User access.
CoreHome.SharePiwikLong:
Hi! I just found a great piece of free software: Matomo!

Matomo will let you track visitors to your website for free. You should definitely check it out!
CoreHome.SharePiwikShort: Matomo! Free/libre web analytics. Own your data.
CoreHome.ShortcutCalendar: to open calendar (d stands for Date)
CoreHome.ShortcutSearch: to open the search (f stands for Find)
CoreHome.ShowJSCode: Show the JavaScript code to insert
CoreHome.SubscribeAndBecomePiwikSupporter: Proceed to a secure credit card payment page (Paypal) to become a Matomo Supporter!
CoreHome.ThereIsNoDataForThisReport: There is no data for this report.
CoreHome.UnFlattenDataTable: The report is flat %s Make it hierarchical
CoreHome.RemoveTotalsRowDataTable: The report is showing the totals row %s Remove totals row
CoreHome.AddTotalsRowDataTable: The report is not showing the totals row %s Show totals row
CoreHome.YouAreUsingTheLatestVersion: You are using the latest version of Matomo!
CoreHome.ClickRowToExpandOrContract: Click this row to expand or contract the subtable.
CoreHome.UndoPivotBySubtable: This report has been pivoted %s Undo pivot
CoreHome.PageUpShortcutDescription: to get to the top of the page
CoreHome.PageDownShortcutDescription: to get to the bottom of the page
CoreHome.PivotBySubtable: This report is not pivoted %1$s Pivot by %2$s
CoreHome.QuickAccessTitle: Search for %s. Use the arrow keys to navigate through search results. Shortcut: Press 'f' to search.
CoreHome.OneClickUpdateNotPossibleAsMultiServerEn: The one-click update is not available as you are using Matomo with multiple servers. Please download the latest version from %1$s to proceed.
CoreHome.CssDidntLoad: Your browser was unable to load the style of this page.
CoreHome.JsDidntLoad: Your browser was unable to load the scripts of this page.
CoreHome.AdblockIsMaybeUsed: In case you are using an ad blocker, please disable it for this site to make sure Matomo works without any issues.
CoreHome.ChangeCurrentWebsite: Choose a website, currently selected website: %s
CoreHome.LeadingAnalyticsPlatformRespectsYourPriv: The leading open analytics platform that respects your privacy.
